Uses of Class
goal.util.BracketedOptions

  • Packages that use BracketedOptions 
    Package Description
    languageTools.program.agent  
    languageTools.program.agent.rules  
    goal.parser.goal  

    • Uses of BracketedOptions in languageTools.program.agent

      Methods in languageTools.program.agent with parameters of type BracketedOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ValidatorError> Module.setOptions(BracketedOptions options)
      Sets the options for this module.
      There are two available options: focus, which can have any value from the Module.FocusMethod enumeration. exit, which can have any value from the Module.ExitCondition enumeration. A warning is generated for every unused option, but are otherwise ignored.

    • Uses of BracketedOptions in languageTools.program.agent.rules

      Methods in languageTools.program.agent.rules with parameters of type BracketedOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RuleSet.setOptions(BracketedOptions options)
      Set the options for this set of rules.
